definition: Creation that has not been removed by the user (it shows up in user's panel)
Registered user that has initiated a creation (active or not). A user forming part of a collaboration (active or not) is also considered as a creator.
Registered user that has published a creation (active or not). A user forming part of a published collaboration (active or not) is also considered as a publisher.

Registered user that has published a creation (active or not) in their social profile (active or not). A user forming part of a collaboration (active or not) in owner's social profile (active or not) is also considered as a promoter.
